website_summaries.verdict: The best of chips and dip without having to mess with the dip.
pros: A light and consistent chip with tangy flavoring that is not too strong
Packaging keeps too many chips from breaking
cons: Caution: you cannot eat just one

customer_reviews.title: Pringles Sour Cream and Onion Chips Arrive As Crumbs
customer_reviews.text: The Pringles chips arrived when promised and the containers were in perfect condition. However, the chips in all three canisters were pulverized and could not be served as regular chips. These were a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Pam H.

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS as always, but...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these if planning to serve to casual guests, as they are 'seconds' or got tumbled too much in shipment, as they're mostly broken and some in tiny pieces. I'll continue to buy as I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Might need a spoon.
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered to us in a plastic bag, and when opened it's only crumbs. The taste is awesome, but you might need a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipping container not suitable for chips.  As for taste, who can enjoy chips in small pieces
customer_reviews.text: They arrived all broken into thousand pieces. Packed in an envelope. Horrible
customer_reviews.author: juvenal martinez

customer_reviews.title: Better that none.
customer_reviews.text: I really like potato chips better, but I settle for these. So I can’t quite give them the highest rating, but being able to get them sent is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: MIM

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: by the time they finally arrived they were nothing but crumbs
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Pringles crumbs
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! All the chips were broken into tiny bits.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Chips appear came by slow from China thru stormy seas.. the contents were partial pulvilize.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: don't bother ordering these. they stale and all the chips were broken, the packaging does not protect the product in the least
customer_reviews.author: Aleta

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: some of them were cracked but not a big deal tastes fine
customer_reviews.author: dottie

customer_reviews.title: This was standard size that you buy at the grocery ...
customer_reviews.text: This was standard size that you buy at the grocery store I'm giving 4 stars only because I wish it were cheaper
customer_reviews.author: dawn erichowsky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Taste good pringles as expected. Lost a star because a lot broke in the can
customer_reviews.author: Ned

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: More padding might be nice...but most of the chips were whole.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Crushed up and Stale!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed the pringles were crushed up and stale. Paid for, can't eat!
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Good chips...
customer_reviews.text: I know this will sound strange but I like Pringles because I can eat them without my dentures in.
customer_reviews.author: CW

product_meta.title: Pringles Chips - Sour Cream & Onion - 5.96 oz - 3 pk
product_meta.description: Pringles Chips - Sour Cream & Onion - 5.96 oz - 3 pk
